channel.title: mattress retailer on Logotyp.us
channel.description: Recent content in mattress retailer on Logotyp.us

item.turbo:content:
<! [CDATA[
 Sleep Country Canada Logo
Sleep Country Canada Holdings Inc. is a Canadian mattress retailer, with over 260 stores operating in British Columbia, Alberta, Saskatchewan, Manitoba, Ontario, Quebec, New Brunswick, Prince Edward Island and Nova Scotia. In 2006, the company was ranked one of the top 50 companies to work for in Canada by the Globe and Mail. It is best known for its radio jingle, “Why buy a mattress anywhere else? Ding!” Sleep Country USA, an unaffiliated company, uses the same jingle.
You can download theSleep Countrylogo on full-version of the page.
]] >
item.title: Sleep Country
item.description: Sleep Country Canada Holdings Inc. is a Canadian mattress retailer, with over 260 stores operating in British Columbia, Alberta, Saskatchewan, Manitoba, Ontario, Quebec, New Brunswick, Prince Edward Island and Nova Scotia. In 2006, the company was ranked one of the top 50 companies to work for in Canada by the Globe and Mail. It is best known for its radio jingle, “Why buy a mattress anywhere else? Ding!” Sleep Country USA, an unaffiliated company, uses the same jingle.
